abstract: David Chodounsky wins slalom at United States Alpine Championships in Carrabassett Valley, Me.
lead_paragraph: David Chodounsky successfully defended his slalom title with a fast and clean second run in the final event at the United States Alpine Championships in Carrabassett Valley, Me.

headline.main: Slalom Title Is Defended at U.S. Alpine Championships

snippet: David Chodounsky successfully defended his slalom title with a fast and clean second run in the final event at the United States Alpine Championships in Carrabassett Valley, Me.
